grahampaige.comment:
Okay. And after considering all comments from this evening's meeting,
I am going to go ahead with what we've discussed tonight about supporting
our students' needs through these policies. So therefore, I do agree with them too.
So now let me officially say how I'm voting here at the end.
And so based upon everything said during this session, including public comment period input,
and then also just looking over each section carefully myself again while listening to everyone else talk,
it seems like they're very much aligned together logically across sections A-I within Policy GBEA/JFHA/GBEA-R Staff Responsibilities Policies Professional Development Evaluation Form Use.
